category-def.name: io.sarl
category-def.label: SARL Language
category-def.description: SARL is a general-purpose agent-oriented language. SARL aims at providing the fundamental abstractions for dealing with concurrency, distribution, interaction, decentralization, reactivity, autonomy and dynamic reconfiguration.

category-def.name: io.janusproject
category-def.label: Janus Run-time Platform
category-def.description: Janus is an open-source multi-agent platform, which is reimplemented to support the SARL Agent-Oriented Programming Language.

category-def.name: io.sarl.sources
category-def.label: SARL Developper Resources
category-def.description: Developper resources (sources, etc.) of the SARL project, and related projects (Janus, etc.)
